00001 package com.placesandplaces;
00002 
00003 import java.io.IOException;
00004 
00005 import android.os.Handler;
00006 
00007 import com.rabbitmq.client.QueueingConsumer;
00008 
00013 public class MessageConsumer extends IConnectToRabbitMQ {
00014 
00015         public MessageConsumer(String server, String exchange, String exchangeType) {
00016                 super(server, exchange, exchangeType);
00017         }
00018 
00019         // The Queue name for this consumer
00020         private String mQueue;
00021         private QueueingConsumer MySubscription;
00022 
00023         // last message to post back
00024         private byte[] mLastMessage;
00025 
00026         // An interface to be implemented by an object that is interested in
00027         // messages(listener)
00028         public interface OnReceiveMessageHandler {
00029                 public void onReceiveMessage(byte[] message);
00030         };
00031 
00032         // A reference to the listener, we can only have one at a time(for now)
00033         private OnReceiveMessageHandler mOnReceiveMessageHandler;
00034 
00042         public void setOnReceiveMessageHandler(OnReceiveMessageHandler handler) {
00043                 mOnReceiveMessageHandler = handler;
00044         };
00045 
00046         private Handler mMessageHandler = new Handler();
00047         private Handler mConsumeHandler = new Handler();
00048 
00049         // Create runnable for posting back to main thread
00050         final Runnable mReturnMessage = new Runnable() {
00051                 public void run() {
00052                         mOnReceiveMessageHandler.onReceiveMessage(mLastMessage);
00053                 }
00054         };
00055 
00056         final Runnable mConsumeRunner = new Runnable() {
00057                 public void run() {
00058                         Consume();
00059                 }
00060         };
00061 
00066         @Override
00067         public boolean connectToRabbitMQ() {
00068                 if (super.connectToRabbitMQ()) {
00069 
00070                         try {
00071                                 mQueue = mModel.queueDeclare().getQueue();
00072                                 MySubscription = new QueueingConsumer(mModel);
00073                                 mModel.basicConsume(mQueue, false, MySubscription);
00074                         } catch (IOException e) {
00075                                 e.printStackTrace();
00076                                 return false;
00077                         }
00078                         if (MyExchangeType == "fanout")
00079                                 AddBinding("");// fanout has default binding
00080 
00081                         Running = true;
00082                         mConsumeHandler.post(mConsumeRunner);
00083 
00084                         return true;
00085                 }
00086                 return false;
00087         }
00088 
00096         public void AddBinding(String routingKey) {
00097                 try {
00098                         mModel.queueBind(mQueue, mExchange, routingKey);
00099                 } catch (IOException e) {
00100                         // TODO Auto-generated catch block
00101                         e.printStackTrace();
00102                 }
00103         }
00104 
00112         public void RemoveBinding(String routingKey) {
00113                 try {
00114                         mModel.queueUnbind(mQueue, mExchange, routingKey);
00115                 } catch (IOException e) {
00116                         // TODO Auto-generated catch block
00117                         e.printStackTrace();
00118                 }
00119         }
00120 
00121         private void Consume() {
00122                 Thread thread = new Thread() {
00123 
00124                         @Override
00125                         public void run() {
00126                                 while (Running) {
00127                                         QueueingConsumer.Delivery delivery;
00128                                         try {
00129                                                 delivery = MySubscription.nextDelivery();
00130                                                 mLastMessage = delivery.getBody();
00131                                                 mMessageHandler.post(mReturnMessage);
00132                                                 try {
00133                                                         mModel.basicAck(delivery.getEnvelope()
00134                                                                         .getDeliveryTag(), false);
00135                                                 } catch (IOException e) {
00136                                                         e.printStackTrace();
00137                                                 }
00138                                         } catch (InterruptedException ie) {
00139                                                 ie.printStackTrace();
00140                                         }
00141                                 }
00142                         }
00143                 };
00144                 thread.start();
00145 
00146         }
00147 
00148         public void dispose() {
00149                 Running = false;
00150         }
00151 }
